$interpreted: Dagger: Aosta promised that everything will be alright. Why are you so worked up?
Nolva: It's not that simple. She's waiting for a true miracle to happen...
Kittyeyes: Brother Roger!
Roger: Brother Roger? Kittyeyes, what's the matter?
Aosta: I only said there was a possibility. No promises.
Kittyeyes: YOU!
Kittyeyes: Brother, it's just a misunderstanding. Don't take heed.
Roger: Really? But......
Roger: You, you big pile of fur! Want another taste of my fury?!
Nolva: Wait, Roger, please. It's all just a misunderstanding.
Kittyeyes: Thanks to him, we were able to send you here.
Roger: Is that so?
Dagger: For injuring you...I was acting on impulse. I apologize.
Roger: Since you've helped me when you could have refused, I say we bury the hatchet between us.
Dagger: Nolva mentioned that you saw some men abandoned this chariot before running off. Did you see which way they headed?
Roger: They were very quick. Before I knew it, they were gone!
Dagger: Rats, lost the trail again!
Nolva: Give it some time. It's getting dark outside, why don't you come back with us to the village?
Nolva: Decide what to do next after some rest.
Dagger: A human village?! BUT......
Kittyeyes: Don't be such a scaredy cat. The village folk are very hospitable, you won't frighten them.
Roger: I haven't completely recovered. Think of it as escorting me back.
Dagger: More escorting...right. Since you put it that way, let's go.
Roger: Scoot, scoot. If we stay any longer, I'm afraid I'll be dissected for "research".
Aosta: Hmph.
Nolva: Dr. Clovis, thank you so much for your help.
Aosta: You get along quite well with them...but what does that do? Is it meaningful?
Aosta: Days become weeks, months become years. It's possible that when you wake up, they'll no longer be by your side.
Nolva: That's why I'm trying to live in the moment.
Aosta: ……….
Nolva: I'm heading out as well. Until next time.
Yamitsuki: That person, there he goes again.
Aosta: Where?
Yamitsuki: Underneath that swarm of monsters, headed for the Atlas borders.
Aosta: Hmm.
Aosta: I'm going to be absent for a while.
Aosta: Once you finish my errand, you may return to the Slums, and tell Nigel of our plans.
Yamitsuki: Understood... as long as we stick to the plan, Nigel's safety will be guaranteed?
Aosta: Yes. But should he go rogue, there's no saying what will unfold.

Hmm.
